## Applies to:

Oracle Database - Enterprise Edition - Version 11.2.0.4 and later  
JDBC - Version 11.2.0.4.0 to 11.2.0.4.0 [Release 11.2]  
Information in this document applies to any platform.  

## Details

## _Bugs fixed in the 11.2.0.4 Patch Set_

>   * See
[Note:880782.1](https://support.oracle.com/epmos/faces/DocumentDisplay?parent=DOCUMENT&sourceId=1562142.1&id=880782.1)
for Support Status and Alerts affecting 11.2.0 releases.

>

This note lists customer bugs fixed in the 11.2.0.4 Patch Set which are not
already fixed in an earlier 11.2 Patch Set.  
>  ie: This is the list of fixes added in 11.2.0.4

>

> Bugs are listed by product. RDBMS (Server) bugs are listed under significant
headings relating to either a feature or a characteristic of the bug. Some
bugs are listed in more than one section. Each bug number is hyperlinked to a
[Support Bug
Description](https://support.oracle.com/epmos/faces/DocumentDisplay?parent=DOCUMENT&sourceId=1562142.1&id=245840.1).

>

>   * '*' indicates that an alert exists for that issue.

>   * '+' indicates a particularly notable issue / bug.

>   * 'I' indicates an install issue / bug included for completeness.

>   * 'P' indicates a port specific bug.

>   * **Fixed** versions use "BP _nn_ " to indicate Exadata bundle _nn_.

>   * **"OERI: _xxxx_** " may be used as shorthand for **ORA-600 [ _xxxx_ ]**.

>

>

> ### _Notable exceptions and omissions_

>

>   * **Enterprise Manager / Database Control** fixes are **NOT** listed.

>   * Port specific bug fixes are not usually listed .

>

>

> ### _Critical Patch Update / Patch Set Update content_

>

>   * 11.2.0.4 includes all fixes from the 11.2.0.3.7 Database and Grid
Infrastructure Patch Set Updates, and includes all Critical Patch Update fixes
up to and including CPU October 2013.

>
